item.title: Owner of Swiss ski bar held in custody after deadly New Year's Eve fire
item.description: Jacques Moretti is being held as a potential flight risk, Swiss media reports say.

item.title: Trial starts of man accused of inciting teenagers to harm themselves online
item.description: Prosecutors in Hamburg accuse him of grooming children and teenagers to harm themselves live online.

item.title: Saka agrees new long-term contract with Arsenal
item.description: Bukayo Saka agrees a new long-term contract with Arsenal.

item.title: New York man jailed for London hoax bomb calls
item.description: The man targeted a variety of locations, including including Guy's and St Thomas' hospital.

item.title: US seizes another oil tanker linked to Venezuela, officials say
item.description: The tanker, the Olina, is on multiple countries' sanctions list and is "suspected of carrying embargoed oil", US officials said.
